GSD.product_version: versions from v5.19 to before v6.0.10
GSD.description:
blk-cgroup: properly pin the parent in blkcg_css_online

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.10 by commit d118247e404d6338f7b90636a3c6b95a387ed163, it was introduced in version v5.19 by commit 397c9f46ee4d99024c64954b007c1b5762d01cb4. For more details please see the references link.
